description: A complete crankset with chain rings that can be paired with your preferred bottom bracket.Crank arms are aluminum with a painted finish.Rings are steel with a painted finish.Inner and outer ring fixing bolts are stainless steel.Recommended for use with Shimano® HG chains and Shimano bottom bracket BB-UN26 or BB-UN26K.Compatible with 7 or 8-speed systems.Chain ring combination 48-38-28T.Chain line is 50mm.Chain case compatible.170 or 175mm crank arms.Chain guard included.
name: Shimano Acera FC-M361 (28/38/48) 7/8 Speed Crankset
